TOKEN_REVOKED: en-US: Token revoked. Please log in again.
OTP_SENT_MSG: en-US: OTP has been sent to {{PHONE_NUMBER}}.
OTP_MAX_RETRY_EXCEPTION: en-US: Max retry limit "{{MAX_RETRY_LIMIT}}" of OTP reached, please retry after "{{RESET_OTP_RETRY_HOURS}}" hours
OTP_VERIFICATION_SUCCESS: en-US: OTP verification has been successful.
OTP_EXPIRY_SEC_NOT_DEFINED: en-US: OTP expiry seconds not defined in settings.
OTP_ERROR_WRONG_OR_EXPIRED: en-US: OTP is incorrect or expired (entered after "{{OTP_EXPIRY_SECONDS}}" seconds).
ERROR_FILE_SIZE_LARGE: en-US: File size {{FILE_SIZE_MB}} is larger then allowed size {{MAX_FILE_SIZE_IN_MB}}
ERROR_FILE_TYPE_NOT_ALLOWED: en-US: This file type {{FILE_MIME_TYPE}} is not allowed to be uploaded.
USER_BLOCKED: en-US: You are blocked contact admin at "{{ADMIN_CONTACT_NUMBER}}" OR "{{ADMIN_CONTACT_EMAIL}}".
USER_ROLE_NO_ACCESS: en-US: You don't have access to this resource, contact admin at "{{ADMIN_CONTACT_NUMBER}}" OR "{{ADMIN_CONTACT_EMAIL}}".
ONBOARDING_BOTTOM_TEXT: en-US: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s
HTTP_EXCEPTION_MULTIPLE_GROUP_SAME_NAME: en-US: You cannot create multiple group with same name.
HTTP_EXCEPTION_ONLY_GROUP_OWNER_CAN_ACCE: en-US: Only group owner can access!
HTTP_EXCEPTION_ONLY_GROUP_ADMINS_CAN_ACC: en-US: Only group admins can access!
HTTP_EXCEPTION_ONLY_GROUP_MEMBERS_CAN_AC: en-US: Only group members can access!
HTTP_EXCEPTION_USER_GROUP_COUNT_LIMIT: en-US: You have {{GROUP_USERS_COUNT}} groups and only {{GROUP_CREATION_LIMIT_OF_USER}} groups can be allowed by a user.
